channel.title: (DELTA) Adding a (DROP)Party command!
channel.description:
Hello! And welcome to my Tut about : A command ::party that teles you to the Party room near Camelot bank and it will spawn Npc's Everwhere so other people can also teleport to it! Lets start. Purpose: Make a command that spawn Npc's everwhere that tele you to the Party room! Difficulty: 2/10 , Just started with coding? = 3/10 Tested on: Delta Files editted : Client.java , Clickingmost.Java and Npchandler.java [size=12pt][b]~Just in case, Backup your server before doing this~[/b][/size] Open up your "Client.java" Find (Ctrl + f)
if (command.startsWith
Under a other command add this code (Add under the last } from a command) [code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("party") && playerRights == 3) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3568, 9694, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2809, 3434, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3246, 3520, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2538, 4712, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3093, 3957, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2275, 4690, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2758, 2787, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2600, 3157, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2440, 3089, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2399, 3104, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2657, 2638, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2779, 3863, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2444, 5170, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3087, 3494, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3088, 3525, 0);// Spawning a npc triggerTele(2737, 3470, 0); sM("You spawned a Party!"); yell("(DROP) Party!! Talk to Grail Maiden to teleport to it!"); } [/code] Now let me explain each code.
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("party")
Means if you type ::party the server will do the hole command , You can change ::party to everthing you want.
&& playerRights == 3) {
This means that only Owners (Player rank 3) can do this.
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3568, 9694, 0);// Spawning a npc
This will spawn a Npc. "210" = The npc id. You can change it to whatever you want. (Make sure you can only talk to the NPC) "3568, 9694" = This are the X and Y coord. Here will the Npc spawn. (Change it if you want the Npc on a other place) "0" = High level (99% sure :P) dont mess with it, if you dont need it.
triggerTele(2737, 3470, 0);
This will teleport you to the Party room. So you will be there as first :) "2737, 3470" = The X and Y coord of the Party room. "0" = High level (99% sure :P) dont mess with it, if you dont need it.
sM("You spawned a Party!");
This will send the text to you , So you can see if everthing worked :D You can change it or delete it. Doesnt care.
yell("(DROP) Party!! Talk to Grail Maiden to teleport to it!");
"yell" = Everone will see what the "yell" says. This will help people that are on a special place and dont see that a (DROP)party is gone start ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Go in your Client.Java again and find :
/*NPC Talking*/
If you dont find this try :
switch (NpcDialogue) {
If you dont find any of them search for a Npc in your server that is saying something when you click on it. Like : a word "hello" then search this in your client.java. If everthing is right you will see something like this :
case 1: talk("Some text", Npc id.); break;
Scroll to the end off all those "Cases" at the end of all those cases add a new one. Add this : [code]case x: talk("There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?", 210); break; case x: choice("Ofcours!", "Nah I am busy!"); break;[/code] "Case x" = Give the X a diffrent number what isnt used as a case already! Write the both X on a empty notepad , So you can remember it for later.
talk
This means that the npc says something (Dont mess with it)
There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?
This means the text the npc is gone say.
210
Npc id.
break;
Just dont mess with it! What i did.
case 570: talk("There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?", 210); break; case 571: choice("Ofcours!", "Nah I am busy!"); break;
I used 570 and 571 becaus that cases werent used. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- After you did that above search in your client.java something like this :
if(NPCID == 2633){ NpcDialogue = 501; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
You wont find this code. But your already coded Npcdialogue need to look like this. ---
if(NPCID == 2633){ NpcDialogue = 501; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
Add somewhere around Those codes : [code] if(NPCID == 210){ NpcDialogue = x; NpcDialogueSend = false; }[/code] The "X" need to be your first "x" you added By those Cases. What i did :
if(NPCID == 210){ NpcDialogue = 570; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
if(NPCID == 210)
This will be the Npc that says your text
NpcDialogue = x; NpcDialogueSend = false;
Do not fuck with Npcdialoguesend = false Npcdialogue = x; Means the Case of the npc text (You just added) Pff.. That was long! Only one thing left in Client.java and were done with Client.java! Search for :
case 40:
Under this you will see things like this (if that is coded on your server)
if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2|| NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||
Add some where in it (DONT BREAK THE LINE! JUST PLACE SOMETHING IN IT.) [code]|| NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == x[/code] Make the First "x" to your case that comes as first (The text) then the Choise case. By me it looks like this :
|| NpcDialogue == 570 || NpcDialogue == 571
So it will look something like this.
NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||
By me it looks like this
NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == 570 || NpcDialogue == 571 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||
This ^ will make that the Npcdialogue comes after each other! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- What a work! But Client.java if done :) (Hardest File) --------- This gone be easy. Open up your Clickingmost.java Search for something like this :
c.sM("You need a magic level of 74 or better to cast this spell.");
(If you dont find this search for a other choice option that is already in your Server!) Scroll down till you see the first "break;" make space and Past after that : [code]if(c.NpcDialogue == x){ c.closeAll(); c.toX = 2737; c.toY = 3470; }[/code] Make the "X" to your second case you added (The choice) , You dont remember? here. --------you added before in client.java------------ case x: talk("There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?", 210); break; case x: choice("Ofcours!", "Nah I am busy!"); break; -------Write the second X in --------------------------
if(c.NpcDialogue == x){
--------------------------------------- A little explain :
if(c.NpcDialogue == x){
No explain needed. Just add it , Not importent Look above.. Little explain about it.
c.closeAll();
I explain later.
c.toX = 2737; c.toY = 3470;
This will teleport you to that X and Y coord if you click on Option "yes" -------------------- Now search in your Clickingmost.java
case 9158:
Add under it
c.NpcDialogue == x
"x" = The same X as the other X in clickingmost.java. If it isnt the first "c.NpcDialogue == x" add after a other one :
|| c.NpcDialogue == x
"x" = The same X as the other X in clickingmost.java I realy dont know what we just added :D! I think it means that it closed your Chat after teleport or clicking No.. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- hehe U can still follow? :D Open up Npchandler.java Find :
if (npcs[i].RandomWalk == true) { npcs[i].getNextNPCMovement(); }
Something like that! add under it. [code]if (npcs[i].npcType == 210) { //npc id, the npc that says it. if (misc.random2(4) <= 3) //Time between saying your text. { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "(DROP) PARTY! Click on me to teleport to it"; //change that to what you want. } }[/code] Pleas! I explained so much :D Want a Explain? [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440101.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440101.0.html[/url] Compile.. No errors? great! And goodluck! ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- PFFF that was my TUT i hope you dont get errors.. If you get feel free to post in comment or PM me! Credits : 45% for making the Tut and finding out how to add this. (THIS IS NOT RIPPED OUT DELTA SOURCH) 50% Delta For the great sourch. 5% for Tehcow (How to make Npc shout Guide) So i didnt have to explain XD pleas be nice this is my first (Hard worked) tut :D Youridudock

@youridudock wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:19, topic:362176”]hey guys cmon , this is his probably the first tut , and as he mentioned he doest know english that well , so give the guy a break here.

other than that , your tutorial is a bit messy[/quote]
Yes i am sorry. People are always so mad :d

I vain I :Actually a lot of things are good enough for me.
I was only telling him that his conventions were horrible, and that the method is pointless as it only alerts the people about it, and spawns like 20 NPCs, when he could have used a for loop.
Also, the user has to drop the items himself, so it isn’t a ‘drop party command’ it is only a ‘drop party alert command.’

How to make something like that then? ExplaiN!

Read full topic

item.title: (DELTA) Adding a (DROP)Party command!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 210) { //npc id, the npc that says it. if (misc.random2(4) <= 3) //Time between saying your text. { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "(DROP) PARTY! Click on me to teleport to it"; //change that to what you want. } }

^ here is how this code should of been posted

if (npcs[i].npcType == 210) { //npc id, the npc that says it. if (misc.random2(4) <= 3) { //Time between saying your text. npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "(DROP) PARTY! Click on me to teleport to it"; } }

It just makes it look much easier on the eyes ;D

Read full topic

item.title: (DELTA) Adding a (DROP)Party command!

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

The tutorial is sloppy it’s all over the place, the conventions in this thread are terrible, the method is horrible.

item.title: (DELTA) Adding a (DROP)Party command!
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

And for your learning experience, = means to set a variable to a value, and == means to check a variable for a value.

@Tutorial
You didn’t have to add a new method.

Read full topic

[quote=“Dastan_, post:8, topic:362176”]this is a wrong statement

[code=cmf]clickingMost.java:3389: not a statement

                                          ^

1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .[/code][/quote]

You change a variable using one equal sign, not two.

c.NpcDialogue = 700;

item.title: (DELTA) Adding a (DROP)Party command!
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Hello! And welcome to my Tut about : A command ::party that teles you to the Party room near Camelot bank and it will spawn Npc’s Everwhere so other people can also teleport to it!
Lets start.

Purpose: Make a command that spawn Npc’s everwhere that tele you to the Party room!
Difficulty: 2/10 , Just started with coding? = 3/10
Tested on: Delta
Files editted : Client.java , Clickingmost.Java and Npchandler.java

[size=12pt]~Just in case, Backup your server before doing this~[/size]

Open up your “Client.java”
Find (Ctrl + f)

if (command.startsWith

Under a other command add this code (Add under the last } from a command)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("party") && playerRights == 3) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3568, 9694, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2809, 3434, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3246, 3520, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2538, 4712, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3093, 3957, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2275, 4690, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2758, 2787, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2600, 3157, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2440, 3089, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2399, 3104, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2657, 2638, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2779, 3863, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 2444, 5170, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3087, 3494, 0);// Spawning a npc server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3088, 3525, 0);// Spawning a npc triggerTele(2737, 3470, 0); sM("You spawned a Party!"); yell("(DROP) Party!! Talk to Grail Maiden to teleport to it!"); }

Now let me explain each code.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("party")
Means if you type ::party the server will do the hole command , You can change ::party to everthing you want.
&& playerRights == 3) {
This means that only Owners (Player rank 3) can do this.
server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(210, 3568, 9694, 0);// Spawning a npc
This will spawn a Npc. "210" = The npc id. You can change it to whatever you want. (Make sure you can only talk to the NPC) "3568, 9694" = This are the X and Y coord. Here will the Npc spawn. (Change it if you want the Npc on a other place) "0" = High level (99% sure :P) dont mess with it, if you dont need it.
triggerTele(2737, 3470, 0);
This will teleport you to the Party room. So you will be there as first :) "2737, 3470" = The X and Y coord of the Party room. "0" = High level (99% sure :P) dont mess with it, if you dont need it.
sM("You spawned a Party!");
This will send the text to you , So you can see if everthing worked :D You can change it or delete it. Doesnt care.
yell("(DROP) Party!! Talk to Grail Maiden to teleport to it!");
"yell" = Everone will see what the "yell" says. This will help people that are on a special place and dont see that a (DROP)party is gone start

Go in your Client.Java again and find :

/*NPC Talking*/
If you dont find this try :
switch (NpcDialogue) {

If you dont find any of them search for a Npc in your server that is saying something when you click on it.
Like : a word “hello” then search this in your client.java.

If everthing is right you will see something like this :

case 1: talk("Some text", Npc id.); break;

Scroll to the end off all those “Cases”
at the end of all those cases add a new one.
Add this :

case x: talk("There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?", 210); break; case x: choice("Ofcours!", "Nah I am busy!"); break;

“Case x” = Give the X a diffrent number what isnt used as a case already!
Write the both X on a empty notepad , So you can remember it for later.

talk
This means that the npc says something (Dont mess with it)
There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?
This means the text the npc is gone say.
210
Npc id.
break;
Just dont mess with it!

What i did.

case 570: talk("There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?", 210); break; case 571: choice("Ofcours!", "Nah I am busy!"); break;

I used 570 and 571 becaus that cases werent used.

After you did that above search in your client.java something like this :

if(NPCID == 2633){ NpcDialogue = 501; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

You wont find this code. But your already coded Npcdialogue need to look like this.

if(NPCID == 2633){ NpcDialogue = 501; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Add somewhere around Those codes :

if(NPCID == 210){ NpcDialogue = x; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

The “X” need to be your first “x” you added By those Cases.
What i did :

if(NPCID == 210){ NpcDialogue = 570; NpcDialogueSend = false; }
if(NPCID == 210)
This will be the Npc that says your text
NpcDialogue = x; NpcDialogueSend = false;
Do not fuck with Npcdialoguesend = false Npcdialogue = x; Means the Case of the npc text (You just added)

Pff… That was long! Only one thing left in Client.java and were done with Client.java!

Search for :

case 40:
Under this you will see things like this (if that is coded on your server)
if (NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2|| NpcDialogue == 3 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||

Add some where in it (DONT BREAK THE LINE! JUST PLACE SOMETHING IN IT.)

|| NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == x

Make the First “x” to your case that comes as first (The text) then the Choise case.
By me it looks like this :

|| NpcDialogue == 570 || NpcDialogue == 571

So it will look something like this.

NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == x || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||

By me it looks like this

NpcDialogue == 1 || NpcDialogue == 2 || NpcDialogue == 570 || NpcDialogue == 571 || NpcDialogue == 4 || NpcDialogue == 5 || NpcDialogue == 6 || NpcDialogue == 8 ||

This ^ will make that the Npcdialogue comes after each other!

What a work! But Client.java if done (Hardest File)

This gone be easy.
Open up your Clickingmost.java
Search for something like this :

c.sM("You need a magic level of 74 or better to cast this spell.");
(If you dont find this search for a other choice option that is already in your Server!) Scroll down till you see the first "break;" make space and Past after that : [code]if(c.NpcDialogue == x){ c.closeAll(); c.toX = 2737; c.toY = 3470; }[/code]

Make the “X” to your second case you added (The choice) , You dont remember? here.
--------you added before in client.java------------
case x:
talk(“There is a (DROP)Party! Wanne tele to it?”, 210);
break;
case x:
choice(“Ofcours!”, “Nah I am busy!”);
break;
-------Write the second X in --------------------------

if(c.NpcDialogue == x){

if(c.NpcDialogue == x){
